Testing Guide¶

Markers¶

  • web: Flask routes and HTML rendering

  • buttons: Pull/Update endpoints and busy-state behavior

  • analysis: Labels and percentage formatting

  • db: Inserts, schema, and queries

  • integration: End-to-end flows

Run Marked Tests¶

pytest -m "web or buttons or analysis or db or integration"

Selectors¶

  • data-testid="pull-data-btn"

  • data-testid="update-analysis-btn"

Test Doubles¶

Tests use dependency injection in create_app to pass fake scraper, cleaner, loader, and analysis functions to keep tests fast and deterministic.

Grad Cafe Analytics
